document.masterDocTitle: Acrotritia species (Acari: Oribatida: Euphthiracaridae) from China with description of a new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Acrotritia species (Acari: Oribatida: Euphthiracaridae) from China with description of a new species

subSubSection.paragraph:
Measurements. Prodorsum: length 210–215 , width 160–168 , height 100–102 , setae: ss 80–82 , ro 50–55 , in 100–105 , le 65–72 , ex 7–8 , mutual distance: in– in 80–85 , le–le 40–43 , ro–ro 35–38 ; notogaster: length 360–380 , width 285–295 , height 305–312 ; c 1 60–62 , c 2 55–58 , c 3 55–56 , c p 60–62 , d 1 55–58 , d 2 50–52 ,
e 1 55
–56,
e 2 50
–52, h 1 60–61 , h 2 45–47 , h 3 55–58 , ps 1 60–62 , ps 2 55–58 , ps 3 50–51 , mutual distance: c 1 – d 1 100–105 , d 1 – e 1 125–131 , e 1 – h 1 90–94 , h 1 – ps 1 85–87 ; genito-aggenital plate 155 × 75 , ano-adanal plate 190 × 55 .

Colour yellowish; prodorsum with one pair of long and strong lateral carinae; sensilla setiform, slightly swollen at distal end and covered with small spines; prodorsal and notogastral setae robust, rigid and sparsely barbed in distal half, except exobothridial setae; vestigial setae f 1 not observed; 9 or 10 pairs of genital setae present, including 1 pair of setae inserted on progenital area; 2 pairs of aggenital setae located longitudinally; tarsi of legs monodactylous.

Material examined . China : Beijing:
4 adults
(in alcohol, CJ-02- 7 ), Sanpu, from litter under broad-leaved tree,
27 Apr. 2002
, leg. Jun Chen;
2 adults
(in alcohol, W- 88 - 34 ), Changping, from leaves,
19–21 Oct. 1988
, leg. Hui-Fu Wang, Xue-Zhong Zhang and Cen-Xuan Pan;

(in alcohol, W- 88 - 43 ), from litter under weed, other data same as W- 88 - 34 ;

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 6.
Acrotritia refracta
(Niedbała, 1998)
: A, lateral view of body (legs removed); B, prodorsum, dorsal view; C, ventral plate; D–G, trochanter, femur, genu and tibia: D, leg I; E, leg II; F, leg III; G, leg IV. Scale bars: A=100 µm; B–G=50 µm.

FIGURE 7.
Acrotritia simile (Mahunka, 1982)
: A, lateral view of body (legs removed); B, prodorsum, dorsal view; C, sensillum, dorsal view; D, sensillum, lateral view; E, ventral plate; F–I, trochanter, femur, genu and tibia: F, leg I; G, leg II; H, leg III; I, leg IV. Scale bars: A–B, E–I=100 µm; C–D=50 µm.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks. This species is mainly distinguished from
Acrotritia sinensis
Jacot, 1923
by the shape of sensilla (setiform and slightly swollen at distal end in
A. simile
versus with fusiform head in
A. sinensis
).
